title: Projects
preamble:
Throughout my coding journey, I've invested time in diverse personal projects, honing my skills across web applications, APIs, and more. These projects showcase my adaptability in various facets of software development.
Driven by a passion for innovation, these endeavors underscore my commitment to staying ahead in tech trends and continually expanding my skill set.
Explore the detailed portfolio of these projects to witness the outcomes of my efforts.

projects.title: The Biergarten App
projects.text: The Biergarten App is a full-stack web application for beer lovers to share their favourite brews and breweries with like-minded people online. Users can create an account, add their favourite beers and breweries, and interact with other users by liking and commenting on their posts.

projects.title: SpoonBot
projects.text:
SpoonBot is a web application powered by OpenAI's GPT-3 API, showcasing its ability to generate restaurant names, detailed restaurant reviews, and enticing restaurant menus based on a user's input. 
 This project demonstrates the potential of AI in the food and beverage industry, providing a glimpse into the possibly disruptive applications of AI in the future.

projects.title: DoggoBot
projects.text: The DoggoBot is a Discord bot built in TypeScript using the discord.js library. Its main functionality is to periodically send pictures of dogs to designated channels on Discord servers, showcasing the potential of Discord bots for automating tasks and providing entertainment.
